titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 149: Risālat al-waẓāʼif al-wāfiyah.

note: Owner's note dated 961 A.H. (1554 CE) and stamp (f. 1r).

msContents.summary: Treatise on grammar and parts of speech, commenting on the Kāfiyah of Ibn al-Ḥājib. Some pages have been repaired.

persName.#text: ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Ramaḍān, active approximately 1551
عبد الكريم بن علي بن رمضان،

supportDesc.extent: i, 68, i leaves : 115 x 188 (56 x 136) mm, bound to 120 x 188 x 16 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

binding.p: Bound in brown leather with flap (Type II); gold tooled central knot motif and frame; marbled paper doublure.

origin.p: Copy completed by ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Ramaḍān between 958 and 961 A.H. (1551 and 1554 CE) (f. 68r-68v).

provenance: Presumed to be a gift of David Eugene Smith.
Formerly owned by David Eugene Smith.
